website_summaries.verdict: Smaller tank does limit its overall cooling period, but also improves portability. Those who seek fast relief in hot conditions will get it.
pros: Very lightweight, suitable for young children
Effective for "hot flashes" and other body temperature issues
cons: Better for indoor beauty humidifying use, not outdoor events

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 3 days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take to an outdoor wedding. It definitely helped me beat the heat and everyone was super jealous. Then I took it to a concert and it worked really well. I used it around the house while I was outside one day and then the misting effect quit working. It's still a functional fan, but at such slow a slow speed and without the mist it's a waste. Too bad I barely missed the window of opportunity to return this for a refund! I'm not sure the little bit of enjoyment I got out of it was worth nearly $20. I guess that's the chance you take when buying generic products on amazon. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: mmichael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for theme parks on hot days!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Worked amazingly on a hot day waiting in lines at Disneyland! I had to share the air with all my friends haha. The color is true to the photos so it's pretty to look at. It functions great with it's multiple wind settings and the mist comes out nicely, uniform, and strong. The water container on top where the mist comes from seals pretty tight so even when jostling around in my backpack it never leaked. It's a bit bulkier than your traditional mobile mister/fan but that's the price you pay for more air and more mist. It fit nicely in my mini-back I took to Disneyland. And it's easy to hold. It's also very light. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Operational use COULDN'T be better!
customer_reviews.text: Ok where do I start. The functional ability is outstanding and it's very easy to use. It's not SUPER HEAVY but it's not lightweight either. The fan will come in a white box and inside the white box is the fan and USB charger in a plastic type thing. The fan has 3 settings for which breeze suits you and MAN IS IT GREAT! The mist also has 2 settings for continuous mist or intermittent mist. The top part of the fan contains the water reserve where you would use the tiny bottle squeezer to get water into the small hole. Overall, great product, I would totally buy for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Marie M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan! I think it'll be great when I go on vacation to Florida and it's stifling hot. It really puts out a lot of air for as small as it is. The misting part is perfect. Would definitely recommend to anyone, especially for ladies in menopause.
customer_reviews.author: MsGrass

customer_reviews.title: Hot flash answer
customer_reviews.text: If you believe global warming is a reality, this is a must-have product. Battery life between charges is crazy long. Water mist makes you feel like you’re storing under a/c vent. On a plane, in the car, at the park or beach, you won’t find a better solution to rising temp. My wife loves it for her hot flashes. Probably not an application the manufacturer envisioned.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't help in hot climates
customer_reviews.text: I live in Phoenix AZ and was hoping this would help cool me down in 100+ degree weather but there is zero impact outside. It works ok indoors but so does AC. It does not blow hard enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Disney World trip but only had to use it one day because we were lucky enough to have experienced lows in the 40's and highs in the low 70's. The mister is fantastic and doesn't blow out a ton of water but was a light mist. This is a great little fan and I am excited to be able to carry it around in my purse during the summer because I'm pregnant now and hot ALL THE TIME. I know this will be so helpful! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Loren LaFayette

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre. The mist is so light that it is almost pointless. The fan is nice and quiet with a very gentle blow. I purchased this because I teach in school without air-conditioning. It is awful in June and September so I like the size of this because if it’s in my bag easily and it gives a little relief. But I wouldn’t buy it again. I’ll look for something a wee bit more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Roma

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!! :D
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It didn't take long to charge at all and what's awesome is that it comes with a small little bottle in which you can pour the water. I was looking for something like this on the hot days where there's no AC. This works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Chavarin

customer_reviews.title: Weak winds and terrible misting fan.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to go to Coachella. The misting is very fine (it uses ultrasonic vibrations to deliver the mists) to a point that I did not feel the misting. I would also approximate the water reservoir to only hold about 15 ml of water. The fan did not produce strong enough winds. Overall disappointing purchase. I ended up using my friend's dollar store misting fan bottle for the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: RandomStrangerOnTheInternet

customer_reviews.title: Great for Disney!
customer_reviews.text: This fan was great for a trip to Disney World in July. It has 3 speeds and an option for the mist to be on. The fan works great! It is lightweight and very portable. There is a squirt bottle to use to fill the water holder on the fan. I wish I could feel the most more. It more just helps the air from the fan feel cooler. Overall, it was a great fan to help beat the Florida heat and humidity. I would definitely recommend this fan!
customer_reviews.author: Lori B

customer_reviews.title: Nice mist
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my neeborn cool during parades and other summer activities. It worked really well for that purpose. The most comes out really nicely, not in big drops of water. The battery seems to last a long time, although I’ve not timed it. I just wish there were a way for me to hang it in the car seat or stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysha

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to use in Disney World & ended ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use in Disney World & ended up just buying the ones they sell at every concession stand there because these barely blew any air when fully charged and the water feature is a joke. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Dana A Giampietro

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our family vacation to Disney World. Powerful portable fan that my 5 year old had no problem using and carrying himself. Encountered only one issue of the power button/fan not shutting off. Plugging it into a charger took care of it. (We carried a portable charger). Happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bodacious_m

customer_reviews.title: Great for Disney!
customer_reviews.text: Getting a portable fan with misting options was something that turned up in my research for a Disney trip. This one had great power and wasn't particularly loud. My wife was surprised when I put it on max setting how much air she was getting. We did not need to use the mist option too much, but we did try it out and it worked fine enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dameon

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Japan during Augusts heat and humidity and it saved me! I used all day everyday for 10 days and people were jealous everywhere!! I would charge it at night in hotel and it would last all day on highest settings! Loved it and would buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: S Sand

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks! You have to refill it all the time ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks! You have to refill it all the time and it barely keeps you cool. The fan is weak, weak, weak! I recommend getting a weed sprayer and just filling it up with water, works way better and I learned it the hard way!
customer_reviews.author: Arlin Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: First one i got was defected sp i contacted customer service an they sent me new one the new one is perfect an i love this fan
customer_reviews.author: sammy jo

customer_reviews.title: These were just what we needed to survive Disney!
customer_reviews.text: Did not know what these would really be like when I ordered them, but knew we needed something for the sweltering heat of Orlando in late August. These were just the thing! Ordered 2 fans for our trip to Disney and they did not disappoint. These little fans ack quite a punch and the gentle mist was exactly what we needed to cool and refresh. I would highly recommend these fans. This is my honest feedback (and the feedback of people who questioned me about them on my trip). I was not compensated in any way for my review.
customer_reviews.author: S. DiLullo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little fan
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little fan!! LOVE that it doesn't need batteries, you can just charge it. I haven't used it long enough where it needed to be, but I'm hoping it lasts a while like other reviews mentioned. Different settings for fan speed and misting. The water reservoir doesn't fit much, but it's so easy to refill that I don't think it'll be a big deal to do while out.
customer_reviews.author: Crazyaboutshopping

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for when you're stuck outside in the heat!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a summer camp that requires lots of long days spent outside or on a stuffy school bus. This little thing is a lifesaver! The only downside is how small the water reservoir is, but it can be refilled easily. The mist is so fine that it evaporates almost immediately and it basically feels like standing in front of an air conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  I loved it so much I bought one for my BFF!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for traveling! The cruise lines in particular have gotten very strict with fans that need to be plugged in. As a women of a certain age I need my fan! This portable misting fan fits the bill perfectly and will be my traveling companion forever!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little fan
customer_reviews.text: Have to go to an outdoor event june 1-2. This little fan is very powerful. Just wish it held more water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T HOLD A CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the expectation that it would hold a charge and it does NOT. Had to keep it plugged into a battery pack while using because it wouldn't hold a charge. It would be a great fan if it actually worked as it says it's supposed to :(
customer_reviews.author: bugz98002

customer_reviews.title: Equipment malfunction
customer_reviews.text: This product is lightweight and portable, but mine was defective. I charged it up to bring with me to Disney World to keep cool in the intense heat and humidity of summer. I turned it on, and it wouldn't turn back off. I had to keep it running in my backpack until the battery died. I haven't tried to charge it again to see if it was just malfunctioning in the heat, but I also don't want to try it again in fear that it won't turn off again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was just that great..
customer_reviews.text: this lil fan can blow! there r 3 different speeds which even at the lowest speed it blows strong... the mist Is just mist but it helps.. Used it while fishing and the kids fought over it the whole time.. it was just that great... Differently work the price...
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked beautifully for like a handful of times. Now won't even hold a charge. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT work - Save your Money!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a trip to a theme park. It came on time, and looked well packaged. However, upon turning on the fan, it wouldn't spin. It almost seemed as though the motor wasn't tightened where it should be, and thus the blades couldn't turn. The mist is definitely a mist - almost too misty that you don't feel the water - but that is a preference thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mama1980

customer_reviews.title: Just love this!
customer_reviews.text: This amazing handneld fan has 3 settings so you can go from a soft breeze to one that will surely cool you. It also has the ability to mist all the time.... somethimes... or not at all. I love this and living in Florida I am always hot in the warm months so I cant wait to use it! I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Disney trips!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the Best Buy for anyone doing a theme park trip in the summer. My fiancé and I took them to Disney and I don’t think we could have survived with our them in the middle of August. The mist makes them feel like they are blowing AC into your face and the battery lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Airflow is far too low even on high setting
customer_reviews.text: The airflow level of the fan is far too slow to provide any cooling. The misting function works quite well and provided a pleasant fine mist, but it was not worth carrying this in the bag due to low airflow even on the 'high' setting. I tried charging it up thinking perhaps the battery was dead but this didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: great for hot days!
customer_reviews.text: This saved us on a hot day! I love that there are multiple speeds, as well as a mist option (and there's a small bottle to carry extra water). It's convenient to recharge, so we don't have to worry about batteries. I found that I have to hold the fan closer than arm's-length in order to feel it. I wish there was a way to attach it to a stroller.
customer_reviews.author: It's Just Me

customer_reviews.title: but it does help to cool you after hiking
customer_reviews.text: fan could be a little more powerful...but it does help to cool you after hiking. lite weight holds a long charge for use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Portable Mist Fan
customer_reviews.text: Love my fan, and I really love how it’s rechargeable without having to use batteries all the time, I also love the idea of having a soft mist instead of a spray of water on my face, it’s small and portable, it will fit in your purse/bag.

customer_reviews.title: Paper fan works better
customer_reviews.text: The fan doesn't blow very strongly. A piece of thick paper actually cooled us off better. The reservoir for water is that little piece at the top--only holds about a tablespoon.
customer_reviews.author: sharinpro

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and I don't use the product at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby to fight the Texas heat. The misting feature is pointless, unfortunately. Not enough water comes how to make a difference. Disappointed and I don't use the product at all.
customer_reviews.author: jason shane watson

customer_reviews.title: Coolest thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: Coolest thing ever! (pun intended) This thing is super cool. It has multiple speeds for the fan, and the misting button sprays continuous, fine mist until you press the button again. You don't have to use the fan to use the mist-er, which is nice. Definitely worth the money, and I love the light blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for summer activities
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a lifesaver at a hot baseball game all week! Great purchase for a great price, and extremely happy to have it with me sitting on the hot bleachers.
customer_reviews.author: JillM

customer_reviews.title: save your money, don't bother with this unit
customer_reviews.text: Took this to China for two week trip and it lasted 10 min at the best. Leak and don't work well at all.
customer_reviews.author: krick3tt

customer_reviews.title: Great value for such a little fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan! It works really well and puts out a substantial amount of air for it being so little. Also, love the misting part and it lasts for a long time (I've only charged it twice and used it for a long time while outside at a festival or in a hot place. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Stef W.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan but small tank
customer_reviews.text: Its a good fan with a rechargeable battery. Refilling it is a pain since the hole is so small and the tank is small as well. It works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: REALLY helps cool me down in hot weather.
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my purse all summer. comes in handy waiting in Dr office or anywhere. TN gets hot early and stays hot a very long time. Best money I've spent
customer_reviews.author: J. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Summer Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I have encourged this product with my family and friends. We love it! I am definitely buying two more so I don’t have to share my fan with my husband and child.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Broke on day one
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a portable fan for a concert event and it broke before I even packed it. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Disneyland approved!! 👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: We got this fan so we would have a way to cool down while we were in lines at Disneyland. It works fantastic! We charged it the night before. We would have roasted if we didn’t have it!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Pung

customer_reviews.title: Weak- must hold extremely close to face
customer_reviews.text: Must is way too fine. You can only feel it if you hold it 2 inches away from your face. And then you have to move it around because you can’t cool your entire face simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: B. B.

customer_reviews.title: Mist spray not working consistently
customer_reviews.text: Product works well, but the mist spray sometimes not working according to my 9-year-old daughter. I have to shut it off and turn it off for few times to make it work. We are still using it on our trip in Japan. It is very hot here. Hope the mist spray will hold up, if not, then I may want to return this item. Otherwise overall it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin W.

customer_reviews.title: Mist was not strong at all. Fan worked okay ...
customer_reviews.text: Mist was not strong at all. Fan worked okay. Went to an outdoor concert in AZ in the summer and althought it helped a little with the fan, I wish it had a stronger mist. Even on the top level it was very little.
customer_reviews.author: Shawndelia

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: People at work love it so much they ask me all the time where I got it. So far it works as expected pretty powerful holds a good charge. Couldn't be more pleased. Bought another as a gift i loved it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very COOL!
customer_reviews.text: This works great when it's just a littler too warm to be outside.....but you have to be outside anyway. Love the mist feature. August 2019....still using this. Works great. I take it to the rodeo in those hot August nights. This last year there were people wanting to buy it off me! Haha!
customer_reviews.author: L H Banes

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: This little number was a life saver at an outdoor concert we went to!! I was the envy of everyone around us!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. Small, easy to fill. The mist that it produced is more of a mist than spray which I preferred, keeping sunblock and makeup intact. Will buy again. Not loud either on low setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a clip
customer_reviews.text: Isn't as powerful as I would like it to be for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I haven't bought a mister like this before so maybe my expectations were off, or mine is defective, but the mist is so weak as to be completely ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Culp

customer_reviews.title: Great For Disney!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Great for Disney World or the zoo!
customer_reviews.author: One Clever Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Crucial!
customer_reviews.text: This is VITAL for any preggo, in Texas, in the summer. I literally carry it with me at all times, it's been a life saver. On a full charge it'll run for about 3 Straight hours
customer_reviews.author: Allison Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Worked nicely to keep us cool when our power was out for 3 hours yesterday. We were without AC during that time. Our indoor temp got up to 82 degrees during the outage, but the little fan kept us cool.
customer_reviews.author: Bayou Lady

customer_reviews.title: Light, compact and powerful
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived broken, but the replacement came just two days later. It produces a good "breeze" in three speeds. Not as noisy as others I've tried. I've only had to charge it once in a couple of months. It's a great value!
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Blue fans save lives
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and they were lifesavers. They were passed around among friends. Everyone was so jealous of these. Worked just like they were supposed to. I would definately recommend. Arrived on time in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST personal fan ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST personal fan ever! I have purchased three thus far. Those who have been gift recipients cannot stop thanking me for such a powerful, dependable fan! One special feature is the fact that it is rechargeable! Great product, Insten!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great for Disney
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan to use at Disney World. Works extremely well in the heat. Runs out of water fast but there are many water fountains available in the parks. The only thing I wish this fan had is a way to hang it around my neck or a way to clip it to my belt.
customer_reviews.author: Robert O Smith

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The mist could be a little stronger, but it still did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: StephaniG

customer_reviews.title: I Love this portable fan
customer_reviews.text: I Love this portable fan! I am in my mid fifties and tend to break a sweat often. This fan is small light weight and powerful! I take it to church, work and keep it in my purse till I need it. I also love the long battery life that recharges easily with the provided charger.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Somers

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It was for my wife. She uses it at ballgames. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lew Haugh

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for its size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to take along or use at home. The handle props up the fan perfectly in the towel rack next to my vanity. Charge lasts much longer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these for a trip to Disney World and they came in handy.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfGirls

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS! I wish the water container in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! I wish the water container in the top was a tiny bit larger though! It feels like it runs out super fast, but thats what I get for living in a desert xD!
customer_reviews.author: Eden H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Disney world
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t willing to drop money on the expensive fan inside the theme park when we went to Disney and I was worried this wouldn’t hold up to Florida heat but boy was I wrong! The only thing is I wish the battery lasted longer but for the price it was fine
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Used it in Key West in August during lobster fest and used it again when the electricity went out during a hurricane.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: love it the misting is very good
customer_reviews.text: love it the misting is very good. I took it to a craft show where it was very hot/ I took it out of my purse and every one was looking like they wished they had one.People asked me where i got it .I told them to order it off amazon .com
customer_reviews.author: Ellen L. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, would buy again! Charges and it's ready to go, no batteries needed and mist is very cooling. I'm using in an office and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cool (in every way)
customer_reviews.text: Small, lightweight with multiple speeds and the mist is great. I bought it mainly for the USB charging but it is vastly superior to our prior one. My daughter really loves it.
customer_reviews.author: obensha

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan! We bought for a Disney trip, and it kept us cool all week. The misting feature is great and it’s nice not to worry about batteries.
customer_reviews.author: ak689

customer_reviews.title: The misting part quit after 10 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.text: Just got to Disney the reason for buying the fan. The fan works great. But the misting part work for 10 minutes and quit. Try everything but it won't work.
customer_reviews.author: jeff hadley

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one month
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until it stopped working after only one month.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works great, summer must have
customer_reviews.text: My favorite purchase of the summer. It gets used often and everyone who sees it wants one!
customer_reviews.author: Jinxgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really nice hand fan. i won't be hot ever again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Fan works great, however the mister function is pretty weak
customer_reviews.text: Fan works great, however the mister function is pretty weak. The mist is more like what you would get from a humidifier, but overall a nice fan that I can recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of the fans and one was completely defective . The blades wouldn’t spin it would just make a bad noise
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: What a waste.
customer_reviews.text: Product broken when arrived. charging cord does not even fit into portal. Cheap plastic. Nothing worked. Not even worth sending it back. So very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The fan is as I thought when I ordered it. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: csdd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Great, light weight fan that delivers a cool mist and works very well!
customer_reviews.author: K. Bonowski

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used this at Disney and it worked perfectly. Very happy I bought this for my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Fan stopped working after 3 months, bummer. Can't return after 1 month. Poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Student

customer_reviews.title: so good. Only used twice
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Only used twice, great do far. Keeps good charge
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great midsize handheld fan. Love that it doesn't need batteries, and it gives quite a nice breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Tipsy Traveler

customer_reviews.title: was great to get me thru a volleyball game in a ...
customer_reviews.text: just wish it held a little more water. was great to get me thru a volleyball game in a hot gym.
customer_reviews.author: leslie campos

customer_reviews.title: ... at the top to allow it to be suspended easily.
customer_reviews.text: It needs a small loop at the top to allow it to be suspended easily.
customer_reviews.author: Drew L.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this fan
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this fan. It's like a mini A.C. The different speeds are all pretty powerful, that the misting part isn't even needed. Although it's nice to have the mist as well. This product doesn't seem cheaply made either. And it holds a charge for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I haven't even had to charge it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Wow! It works! Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Disney trip we had for two days end it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good but water tank is very small,so mist lasts only for 20 min or so
customer_reviews.author: guccilola

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This fan is remarkable, it blows so well. I also love the mist!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is awesome! Powerful and sleek design! I bring it everywhere! The mist is also a great plus for sunny hot days! My family all want one for themselves! Great gift idea for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kjh

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Good for indoors but where you need it most outside, totally useless. Not strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. First time use was actually at work and it worked very well. A must have for summer activities in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is great in this heat watching grandsons football. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: dianne Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan. Lightweight and small enough for my 6 year old to hold comfortably. I think my favorite feature of this fan is the speed setting. This fan blows much harder than any of the foam blade fans we have previously purchased. The water tank isn't too big, but it holds probably close to 2 tablespoons of water. Worth the money for the fan alone in my book. Will be getting much use in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Halie Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Like a mini A/C. Held up in the Texas heat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: mine leaked when tilted and the company never replied back

product_meta.title: Insten Portable Misting Handheld Fan, Mini Cool Mist Personal Humidifier w/USB Rechargeable Battery, Powerful Water Spray Cooling Electric Fan for Travel Outdoor Camping Music Festival Blue (3 Speed)
feature_bullets: HEAT WAVE IS COMING: How to stay cool in hot weather especially during outdoor activities? This Compact and lightweight Cooling Fan is the survival tool you must have in this year. Save you from the heart stroke. Stay cool in hot and crowded places.

SMART DESIGN: With 3 modes of speed and 2 modes of spraying. 20 ml water tank to contain enough moisture, while won't add extra burden to the fan. With 20 ml water bottle to fill water to the water tank with ease. LED display shows the operation mode.

RECHARGEABLE BATTERY: Power supplied by USB cable or lithium battery. Working time: 2 - 6 hours. Charging time: 3 hours. Keep you stay cool all day long with power bank. Perfect personal water misting fan for indoor - the office, home, dorm, study, library, games room or outdoor activities - beach, picnic, sporting events, camping, hiking, cycling.

PERFECT FOR EVERYONE: Packed in a delicate box, a great gift idea for mothers, kids, friends, colleagues. 2-in-1 fan and humidifier which can refresh and moisture your face and skin. Color: Blue. Weight: 190g. Size: 3.9 X 1.7 X 7 inches. Material: ABS Plastic. Powered by: 1 X 18650 lithium battery or charging cable.
PACKAGE INCLUDES: 1 X Mini handheld fan. 1 X USB charging cable. 1 X 20 ml water bottle. 1 X 18650 lithium battery.
